alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 9:31PM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Lowlands and agricultural land near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 5.2 feet and then begin rising this evening. It will then rise above flood stage early Friday afternoon then to 16.0 feet on Saturday. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Black River West 15.0 5.3 Wed 2 pm CST 10.3 16.0 15.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 930 AM CST.
